BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.delay#
BlackBox.type:
delay#
  :: Undefined a              -- ARG[0]
  => Clock tag enabled       -- ARG[1]
  -> a                        -- ARG[2]
  -> Signal clk a             -- ARG[3]
  -> Signal clk a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.register#
BlackBox.type:
register#
  :: ( KnownDomain tag dom    -- ARG[0]
     , Undefined a )          -- ARG[1]
  => Clock tag enabled        -- ARG[2]
  -> Reset tag polarity       -- ARG[3]
  -> a                        -- ARG[4] (powerup value)
  -> a                        -- ARG[5] (reset value)
  -> Signal clk a             -- ARG[6]
  -> Signal clk a
BlackBox.template:
-- register begin~IF ~ISENABLED[2] ~THEN
~GENSYM[~COMPNAME_register][0] : block
  signal ~GENSYM[clk][1] : std_logic;
  signal ~GENSYM[ce][2] : boolean;
  signal ~GENSYM[~RESULT_reg][3] : ~TYPO := ~CONST[4];
begin
  (~SYM[1],~SYM[2]) <= ~ARG[2];
  ~RESULT <= ~SYM[3]; ~IF ~ISSYNC[0] ~THEN
  ~GENSYM[~RESULT_r][4] : process(~SYM[1])
  begin
    if rising_edge(~SYM[1]) then
      if ~ARG[3] = '1' then
        ~SYM[3] <= ~CONST[5]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      elsif ~SYM[2] then
        ~SYM[3] <= ~ARG[6]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      end if;
    end if;
  end process;~ELSE
  ~SYM[4] : process(~SYM[1],~ARG[3])
  begin
    if ~ARG[3] = '1' then
      ~SYM[3] <= ~CONST[5];
    elsif rising_edge(~SYM[1]) then
      if ~SYM[2] then
        ~SYM[3] <= ~ARG[6]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      end if;
    end if;
  end process;~FI
end block;~ELSE
~SYM[0] : block
  signal ~SYM[3] : ~TYPO := ~CONST[4];
begin
  ~RESULT <= ~SYM[3]; ~IF ~ISSYNC[0] ~THEN
  ~SYM[4] : process(~ARG[2])
  begin
    if rising_edge(~ARG[2]) then
      if ~ARG[3] = '1' then
        ~SYM[3] <= ~CONST[5]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      else
        ~SYM[3] <= ~ARG[6]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      end if;
    end if;
  end process;~ELSE
  ~SYM[4] : process(~ARG[2],~ARG[3])
  begin
    if ~ARG[3] = '1' then
      ~SYM[3] <= ~CONST[5]
      -- pragma translate_off
      after 1 ps
      -- pragma translate_on
      ;
    elsif rising_edge(~ARG[2]) then
      ~SYM[3] <= ~ARG[6]
      -- pragma translate_off
      after 1 ps
      -- pragma translate_on
      ;
    end if;
  end process;~FI
end block;~FI
-- register end

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.toEnabledClock
BlackBox.type:
toEnabledClock
  :: Clock tag enabled -- ARG[0]
  -> Signal tag Bool -- ARG[1]
  -> Clock tag 'Enabled

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.clockGen
BlackBox.type:
clockGen
  :: (domain ~ Dom nm period -- ARG[0]
     ,KnownSymbol nm         -- ARG[1]
     ,KnownNat period)       -- ARG[2]
  => Clock tag Regular

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.tbClockGen
BlackBox.type:
tbClockGen
  :: (domain ~ Dom nm period -- ARG[0]
     ,KnownSymbol nm         -- ARG[1]
     ,KnownNat period)       -- ARG[2]
  => Signal tag Bool      -- ARG[3]
  -> Clock tag Regular

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.resetGen
BlackBox.type: resetGen :: KnownDomain tag conf => Reset tag 'ActiveHigh
BlackBox.template:
-- pragma translate_off
~RESULT <= '1',
           '0' after ~IF~ISSYNC[0]~THEN(2999 ps + ~PERIOD[0]0 ps)~ELSE3001 ps~FI;
-- pragma translate_on

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.unsafeFromReset
BlackBox.type: unsafeFromReset :: Reset tag polarity -> Signal tag Bool

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.unsafeToActiveHighReset
BlackBox.type: unsafeToActiveHighReset :: Signal tag Bool -> Reset tag 'ActiveHigh

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.fromSyncReset
BlackBox.type: fromSyncReset :: Reset domain Synchronous -> Signal tag Bool

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.unsafeToActiveLowReset
BlackBox.type: unsafeToActiveLowReset :: Signal tag Bool -> Reset tag 'ActiveLow
